def kefir(n,a,b,c):
    s = 0
    ud = b - c
    if ud < a:
        while n >= b:
            s1 = (n // b)
            s += s1
            n -= b * s1
            n += c * s1
    if (a < b) or ((n < b) and (a >= n)):
        s += n // a
    return(s)


n = int(input())
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = int(input())

print(kefir(n,a,b,c))
